title: $28 -- Orchestra Seats: 'Adventures' in Ottawa, Reg. $65
text:
Thank you for updating your zip code Canada's National Arts Centre 
Travelzoo members can save more than 55% off "The Adventures of a Black Girl in Search of God" in Ottawa this fall, called "brilliant" and "one of the most profound, yet joyous new Canadian plays" by the Toronto Star. 
Side Orchestra seating is available for $28.42 (reg. $65) for all performances Oct. 24 - Nov. 7 at the National Arts Centre in Ottawa. 
The play, adapted from a book of short stories written by George Bernard Shaw, is a "joyous affair, bursting with soulful a cappella song and willowy choreography from its 22-strong cast" (Montreal Gazette). It centers on a woman's struggle to move on after the death of her child and the decay of her marriage, all while questioning her faith. Orchestra Seats: 'Adventures' in Ottawa, $ $28
